CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the filter is displayed as a lookup in the Filters Panel. Otherwise, it is displayed as text field Examples for Account.Name on Cases list: - if checked and user picks the Edge Corp. account, the search will return all cases related to this account. - If unchecked and user enters Acme in the text field, the search will return all the cases related to accounts containing Acme in their name: Acme Corp., Acme Construction Only available for related fields of type Text
CustomField.label: Lookup in Filters Panel
